meanings.definition: The act of scoring one stroke under par on a golf hole.
meanings.sent1: Her birdieing on the last hole secured her victory in the golf tournament.
meanings.sent2: In golf, birdieing is a great accomplishment for players.
meanings.sent3: The birdieing competition between the two friends made the game more exciting.
meanings.sent4: His consistent birdieing was like music to the ears of his golf coach.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered loudly at the sight of her birdieing performance.

meanings.definition: The action of making a birdie in golf.
meanings.sent1: After his birdieing, he celebrated with a fist pump.
meanings.sent2: The crowd erupted in applause at her flawless birdieing.
meanings.sent3: His birdieing dance was a sight to behold on the golf course.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the ball dropping into the hole signaled his successful birdieing.
meanings.sent5: The joy of birdieing filled her heart with pride and satisfaction.

meanings.definition: To achieve a birdie in golf.
meanings.sent1: She was birdieing consistently throughout the game.
meanings.sent2: He birdied the final hole to win the match.
meanings.sent3: Birdieing under pressure requires focus and skill.
meanings.sent4: The golfer's determination paid off as he kept birdieing.
meanings.sent5: Birdieing the challenging course felt like a major accomplishment.
